name: Into The Shadow
description:
As part of the GMTK's 2018 Game Jam, with the  theme of "GENERE, but you can't MECHANIC", we have developed a platformer were you can't jump. 

To overcome the pits in your way, you count with the amazing power of turning yourself into your own shadow, and walk over other shadows, projected on the wall.

Translated into English, Spanish and Italian.

Code is available at GitHub: https://goo.gl/ps7PWa

TEAM  MARM:

  • Ricardo Barajas (Barryck)
  • Manuel Rodríguez (Manurocker95)
  • Javier Salcedo (LudusEstArs)
